00026 class JoinRule
00027 {
00028     public:
00029 
00032         enum RelationType {
00034             Injective,
00036             Surjective,
00038             Bijective,
00040             Cartesian
00041         };
00042 
00044         JoinRule();
00046         virtual ~JoinRule();
00047 
00050         virtual BOOLEAN ExecuteRule(const DataItem& fst_item, const DataItem& snd_item) = 0;
00051 
00053         virtual JoinRule::RelationType GetType() = 0;
00054 };
00055 
00057 class StandardJoinRule : public JoinRule
00058 {
00059     typedef JoinRule Base;
00060     public:
00061 
00062         enum ComparisonType {
00064             EqualType,
00066             NotEqualType,
00068             LessType,
00070             NotLessType,
00072             GreaterType,
00074             NotGreaterType,
00076             CartesianType
00077         };
00078 
00080         StandardJoinRule();
00082         virtual ~StandardJoinRule();
00084         void Init (ComparisonType type);
00085 
00087         virtual BOOLEAN ExecuteRule(const DataItem& fst_item, const DataItem& snd_item);
00089         virtual JoinRule::RelationType GetType();
00090 
00091     private:
00092         ComparisonType m_type;
00093 };
00094 
00095 class PhoneNumberJoinRule : public JoinRule
00096 {
00097     typedef JoinRule Base;
00098     public:
00099         PhoneNumberJoinRule();
00100         virtual ~PhoneNumberJoinRule();
00101         virtual BOOLEAN ExecuteRule(const DataItem& fst_item, const DataItem& snd_item);
00104         virtual BOOLEAN MatchPhoneNumbers(const PhoneNumber& number1, const PhoneNumber& number2);
00106         virtual JoinRule::RelationType GetType();
